text.title: Charles Kennedy, former Liberal Democrats leader, dies aged 55
text.head: Charles Kennedy, former Liberal Democrats leader, dies aged 55
Sources

list.item: "David Cameron leads Commons tributes to Charles Kennedy" — BBC News Online , June 3, 2015
